org.aeonium.fxunit

Class FXUnit

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.aeonium.fxunit.FXUnit

  • public class FXUnit
extends java.lang.Object
    Main class of the framework, provides only the static initializer method.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <T> T getController()
      Returns the controller of the FXML UI under test, after the FXML UI has been loaded with the load(java.net.URL) method or displayed using show(java.net.URL);
      static javafx.scene.Parent getRoot()
      Returns the root node of the UI under test.
      static javafx.stage.Stage getStage()
      Returns the stage of the UI under test, after the FXML UI has been loaded and displayed with the show(java.net.URL) method.
      static void init()
      Initialize the JavaFX application framework - necessary for testing JavaFX GUIs.
      static void init(javafx.application.Application instance) 
      static void load(java.net.URL url) 
      static void show(java.net.URL url)
      Load an FXML UI into a new (undecorated) stage and show it.
      static void shutdown()
      Optional method for shutting down the FXUnit framework - currently it is only used for adding a delay of 1s when finishing all test, in order to ensure that the last log actions may terminate.
      static void shutdown(javafx.stage.Stage stage) 

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getStage

        public static javafx.stage.Stage getStage()
        Returns the stage of the UI under test, after the FXML UI has been loaded and displayed with the show(java.net.URL) method.
        Returns:

      • getController

        public static <T> T getController()
        Returns the controller of the FXML UI under test, after the FXML UI has been loaded with the load(java.net.URL) method or displayed using show(java.net.URL);
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the controller.
        Returns:
        The controller.

      • getRoot

        public static javafx.scene.Parent getRoot()
        Returns the root node of the UI under test. Load the UI with the load(java.net.URL) or the show(java.net.URL) method in order to use this getter.
        Returns:

      • init

        public static void init()
        Initialize the JavaFX application framework - necessary for testing JavaFX GUIs.

      • load

        public static void load(java.net.URL url)

      • show

        public static void show(java.net.URL url)
        Load an FXML UI into a new (undecorated) stage and show it. This method internally uses load(java.net.URL) which sets the references to the current controller and the current root node.
        Parameters:
        url - URL of the FXML file.

      • shutdown

        public static void shutdown()
        Optional method for shutting down the FXUnit framework - currently it is only used for adding a delay of 1s when finishing all test, in order to ensure that the last log actions may terminate.

      • init

        public static void init(javafx.application.Application instance)

      • shutdown

        public static void shutdown(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
